page.title: 04HOUSING AND POPULATION - 1
page.content:
{ }As part of a survey we asked people questions about their houses. We visited Sluie Drive, Craignook Road, Corrennie Circle, Victoria Street and Glenholme Gardens. Out of 21 people 9 own a private house, the other have council houses.The table below shows how long they had lived in their home.
{____________________} No. of No. of { }years people {____________________ 1-5 12 5-10 6 >10 3 {____________________ { This tells us that many people are new to Dyce. Page 5 gives more information.
